People, please bother yourself and read trhe description...This is how you do it>>
Install the game...
Go to the link given in the description & download it(remember removing the space between game & burnworld)...
Extract a file named Frogger2_crk...
Paste it in the installation directory...i.e program files\hasbro...
Open the downloaded file and It'll give you a message saying the game has been patched, and then double click the application icon...
You're good to go...(couldn't have made it anymore easier)
Thanks a ton to the uploader... :)
